-- | Dingo Widgets
--   
--   This package contains a set of widgets for the Dingo Rich Internet
--   Application platform.
@package dingo-widgets
@version 0.1.0

module Dingo.Widget.Select
data Select
mkSelect :: Widget w s => w -> [(Text, Text)] -> CallbackM Select
getValue :: Select -> CallbackM Text
onChange :: Select -> CallbackM () -> CallbackM ()
setValue :: Select -> Text -> CallbackM ()
setChoices :: Select -> [(Text, Text)] -> CallbackM ()
instance Typeable Select
instance Typeable SelectState
instance Show Select
instance Show SelectState
instance Widget Select SelectState
instance ToJSON SelectState
instance FromJSON SelectState

module Dingo.Widget.Panel
data Panel
mkPanel :: Widget w s => w -> CallbackM Panel
instance Typeable Panel
instance Typeable PanelState
instance Show Panel
instance Show PanelState
instance Widget Panel PanelState
instance ToJSON PanelState
instance FromJSON PanelState

module Dingo.Widget.Input
data Input
mkInput :: Widget w s => w -> CallbackM Input
getValue :: Input -> CallbackM Text
onChange :: Input -> CallbackM () -> CallbackM ()
setValue :: Input -> Text -> CallbackM ()
instance Typeable Input
instance Typeable InputState
instance Show Input
instance Show InputState
instance Widget Input InputState
instance FromJSON InputState
instance ToJSON InputState

module Dingo.Widget.Button
data Button
mkButton :: Widget w s => w -> Text -> CallbackM Button
getLabel :: Button -> CallbackM Text
onClick :: Button -> CallbackM () -> CallbackM ()
setLabel :: Button -> Text -> CallbackM ()
instance Typeable Button
instance Typeable ButtonState
instance Show Button
instance Show ButtonState
instance Widget Button ButtonState
instance ToJSON ButtonState
instance FromJSON ButtonState

module Dingo.ResourceBundle.JqueryUI.Lightness
jqueryUIStyleResourceBundle :: ResourceBundle

module Dingo.ResourceBundle.JqueryUI
jqueryUIResourceBundle :: ResourceBundle

module Dingo.ResourceBundle.DataTables
dataTablesResourceBundle :: ResourceBundle

module Dingo.Widget.DataTables
data Table
mkTable :: Widget w s => w -> [Text] -> [[Text]] -> CallbackM Table
onTableBodyEvent :: Table -> Event -> CallbackM () -> CallbackM ()
setTableData :: Table -> (Integer, Integer) -> Text -> CallbackM ()
instance Typeable Table
instance Typeable TableState
instance Show Table
instance Show TableState
instance Widget Table TableState
instance ToJSON TableState
instance FromJSON TableState
